Uses of Package
jrtr.glrenderer

  • Packages that use jrtr.glrenderer 
    Package Description
    jrtr.gldeferredrenderer
    An OpenGL renderer with deferred shading implementing the jrtr interfaces.
    jrtr.glrenderer
    An standard OpenGL renderer implementing the jrtr interfaces.
    simple
    A simple 3D graphics application using the jrtr library for 3D rendering.
    simpleVR
    Simple VR application using VRRenderPanel to render onto VR glasses.
  • Classes in jrtr.glrenderer used by jrtr.gldeferredrenderer 
    Class and Description
    GLShader
    Manages OpenGL shaders.
    GLTexture
    Manages OpenGL textures.
    GLVertexArrayObject
    A utility class to encapsulate an OpenGL "vertex array object" (VAO).
    GLVertexData
    An implementation of VertexData which adds the handle to the OpenGL vertex array object (VAO) of this vertex data to it.
  • Classes in jrtr.glrenderer used by jrtr.glrenderer 
    Class and Description
    GLRenderContext
    Implements a RenderContext (a renderer) using OpenGL version 3 (or later).
    GLRenderPanel
    Implementats the RenderPanel interface using OpenGL.
    GLShader
    Manages OpenGL shaders.
    GLVertexArrayObject
    A utility class to encapsulate an OpenGL "vertex array object" (VAO).
    GLVertexData
    An implementation of VertexData which adds the handle to the OpenGL vertex array object (VAO) of this vertex data to it.
    VRRenderContext
    This class implements a RenderContext (a renderer) using OpenGL version 3 (or later).
    VRRenderPanel 
  • Classes in jrtr.glrenderer used by simple 
    Class and Description
    GLRenderPanel
    Implementats the RenderPanel interface using OpenGL.
  • Classes in jrtr.glrenderer used by simpleVR 
    Class and Description
    VRRenderPanel
